TITLE: The Godfather
DESC: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
ACTOR: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton

TITLE: The Shawshank Redemption
DESC: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
ACTOR: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler

TITLE: Schindler's List
DESC: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
ACTOR: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley, Caroline Goodall

TITLE: Casablanca
DESC: Set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.
ACTOR: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains

TITLE: The Wizard of Oz
DESC: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.
ACTOR: Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger, Bert Lahr

TITLE: Psycho
DESC: A Phoenix secretary steals $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
ACTOR: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, John Gavin

TITLE: Forrest Gump
DESC: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.
ACTOR: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Sally Field

TITLE: The Sound of Music
DESC: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.
ACTOR: Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker, Richard Haydn

TITLE: Star Wars
DESC: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the universe from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.
ACTOR: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness

TITLE: 2001: A Space Odyssey
DESC: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial, object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.
ACTOR: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester, Daniel Richter

TITLE: Amadeus
DESC: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.
ACTOR: F. Murray Abraham, Tom Hulce, Elizabeth Berridge, Roy Dotrice
